overview: There are indeed some magical times at the Whore's Wart's School for Witches & Wizards. But the one thing disturbing to the male population is that none of the females have any hair on their twats. Harry, being the most powerful wizard at the school, experiments with dark magic in hopes of big bushes. The results are quite hair raising.
title: Hairy Twatter: A DreamZone Parody
